channel.title: Schedule on BSidesROC
channel.description: Recent content in Schedule on BSidesROC

item.title: Talks
Closing Remarks
Lunch Break
item.description: Lightning Talks are a group of 15-20 minute presentations strung together that happen in the Workshop track in the afternoon. Instead of the 50 minute talks that we organize in the main track, Lightning Talks are open to the public at the day of the event. That means we don’t know what you’ll be talking about. Some ideas for your talk could be: Your favorite new security tool A research project you think the crowd would enjoy An effective way to protect your enterprise Solutions to improve security and privacy If you’re into this idea, plan to sign up for a talk at the registration desk on the day of the con.
